subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: The day in sports included tears of relief from Serena Williams at Wimbledon and easy victories by Novak Djokovic, Andy Roddick and Roger Federer.
snippet: The day in sports included tears of relief from Serena Williams at Wimbledon and easy victories by Novak Djokovic, Andy Roddick and Roger Federer.
